channel.title: Compiler Needed; Class Paths
channel.description: I need help with my compiler. I downloaded this source + client but the client's compiler does not work. This is what the compiler had in it: [code]@echo off title Building Files javac -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause[/code] But it says: [code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue.[/code] Can someone tell me either how to make that compiler work or give me a compiler that works? It is a PI client, so I am not sure what you would do for the paths. The two files in it are "Java" and "Class". I am not sure if it is allowed, but if you give help me successfully, I will give you $20 USD via Paypal. (If it is not against the rules.) Thanks! Note: I am not sure if this is in the wrong section, since it's compiler. But it probobly is. :D

item.title: Compiler Needed; Class Paths
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I need help with my compiler. I downloaded this source + client but the client’s compiler does not work.
This is what the compiler had in it:

@echo off title Building Files javac -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause
But it says:

'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue.

Can someone tell me either how to make that compiler work or give me a compiler that works? It is a PI client, so I am not sure what you would do for the paths. The two files in it are “Java” and “Class”.
I am not sure if it is allowed, but if you give help me successfully, I will give you $20 USD via Paypal. (If it is not against the rules.) Thanks!
Note: I am not sure if this is in the wrong section, since it’s compiler. But it probobly is.

Read full topic
